values:
Hey, It's 3.15 in the morning and I just got done watching The Princess Diaries because we got rid of our cable and I've been watching old VHS. Well watching the movie made me sad. It made me miss my grandmom. It hits me from time to time that shes really gone. In the movie Mia and her grandmom spend a lot of time together and it made me want to go see my grandmom but then I realized that thats impossible. But thats enough about that.-Summer is finally over and school is unfortunately here on Thursday. I guess my summer was okay. I didn't really go on a vacation but I did have a fun summer. Well im gonna go. Bye.

♥
http://x0-monica-0x.livejournal.com/12353.html

heyy,
well the past few days [with the exception of last night]have been pretty tough, most of you know why though so I ain't going to get into it. 

But I just wanted to thank Steph, Alex, Lisa and Sharon again for being there for me. You are my good friends and it meant a lot that you came. And know that I am there for you guys whenever and whatever time it is. We might go through some pretty rough times but hopefully we'll be friends for along time.

Well, I think last night was pretty fun :)
It helped me a lot. 

-Monica♥

hey, I'm really bored so I decided to write. Yea, I pretty much did nothing all day but sit at the computer, sounds pretty excitig, right?
Anyway though, some people are just not meant to be friends, or close friends. You can try so hard to be someones friend and if they don't want it than its not going to happen. So the best thing to do is just be laid back and let things happen I guess.
But in the past week I have found out quite a few things bout people, who I had no idea had things like this going on and im glad SOME people are opening up to me.
Well, tom. is finally Friday, I think I'm hanging out with Kim and whoever.--Kim, thanks for looking for songs.--Then, we'll see what im doing the rest of the weekend. Well I'm going to go, bye.
<3 Always
Monica

hey, well the holidays are over and school is tom. My vacation was pretty good, I did a lot I guess and I hung out with different people. Today I hung out with Kim, we haven't hung out just me and her in a while so it was fun. I had a long conversation with Kate S. last night, I haven't talked to her in forever so we were catching up on things, but I forgot to ask her if we have bowling tom. Well im going to go bye.
<3 Always,
Monica

hey,
I haven't written in a while. I've been alright. Christmas was alright. And me and Kim decided that we were going to make some changes and make the new year better than the year we're in now. And so far our "change" has been okay. We decided to make the best of every opportunity..and well I guess you can say we have, last night I had some opportunities and i took them..and our plans for New Years Eve might be getting changed because of someone's circumstance (haha Kim)..but whatever happens im going to make the best of it. This upcommig year is an opportunity to make some changes and thats exactly what I plan on doing.(hopefully they'll be good changes)
<3 Always,
Monica
http://x0-monica-0x.livejournal.com/9840.html

hey,
everything is blah lately...school especially makes me so upset; well not even school..its more like all my friends from school..everyone is always upset and doing stupid things..im not really anyones close friend in school besides kim and ashley, so i dunno half the stuff thats going on but i hear bits and pieces and it is just so upsetting being there..and i cant say things to people anymore like i wish i could because it would just be hypocritical..so i dunno..

but on a happier note we did good in bowing today..we won 3/4.. and it was on horrible lanes that were so dry and you had to keep your own score..then came dance..we didn't have a class because it was only me lisa and trish who decided to show up but i picked my costume for the solo.. but i still have no song...i thought i did but it is already being used (thanks anyway kim).

And lastly, i hope everyone else is doing okay..i know there are so many people who are in worst situations than me.. and i just want to say hold on..everything will be okay in time..just count on friends..and never feel like hurting yourself is the answer to any problem..there are so many other ways to deal with things..after hurting yourself the problem is still there and you have a scar(internal or external) to remind you of all your probems.

And to all my friends who have been there for me for so long..thank you so much..i may not show it all that well, but all of my friends mean so much to me..and i told many of you before, if you ever need a friend to talk to anytime,you know where to come.
Im going to go..bye.
<3 Always
*Monica

hey, im doing a solo for dance!.. 11 years of dancing is finally going to pay off... but now I need a song...any suggestions??
xoxo

*hey
Since I last updated..Me and Sharon went to see Bob on is break..we were just laughin the whole time..it was fun..then when he went back to work we went to Sharons..she showed me EVERYTHING in her room(which is a lot)lol..and we talked and then took crazy pictures haha but i think I blinked in some by accident..but its alright lol..and then my mom picked me up and now im here....im on the phone with kate s..i shoud be doing my homework..but i'll get to it...Well I had a good weekend and I had fun hanging out with Sharon today on her birthday!..we never really talked so much till today..good times..Well im gonna go byeZ.
xoxo
*monica
http://x0-monica-0x.livejournal.com/9185.html

*hey
This weekend was good..
Friday was sharons party..It was fun..I first I was talking to sharon's friend Crystal...then I was mostly with their friends from Lincoln..then when all the guys left we were watching movies and talking..then we went to bed and the next day got dropped off at like 2.30...then later on I went out with Kim and Heather and we were hanging out with Keenan and his friends from school..but then we started talking to Cp and his friend Joe and the rest of the guys got mad and left..so we went to Joe's..haha that was a different experience..then Kev and them called back and so we went to meet them and we were like standing around all night..it was pretty fun though..haha..and now all the guys think me and kim got with each other..dumbass me made it sound that way and when i tried explaining that we didnt i just kept digging myself in deeper and deeper.. and then today me and sharon went to mass at saint leos..haha then we came back to my house and talked about everything from sex to religion and God..lol and she left a little bit ago but we're going to see bob at work caz his break is comming up so i'll write later..byeZ!
xoxo
*monica
And Kim call me later because I want to talk to you..I hope you aint mad at me.

*hey
Today had its good and bad points so far..School was okay.. i feel bad for some people though..rumors can really hurt someone..and some people need to grow up(you put it well there ashley)..anyway i try to stay out of it for the most part.
We got our champion shirts today for flag football for the after school league..and then tonight we have a game..its gonna be o0 so much fun..(sarcastic).
Yea and tom. when almost the whole school has off, i have to go in just because i couldnt pay for the fund raiser...yea so i have to go in and do work straight through from 8 till 12..and then what dont get done in school i have to do for homework caz it counts as a grade. Yea.. well to me it seems that all the people who couldnt pay are gettin punished for not being as wealthy as others..So I wanted to let them know that i think its unfair so I wrote a letter stating the predicament im in and letting them know my opinion on the whole thing and i took it to the activities office today after school. Well he said the letter was well written and he shook my hand and talked to me for a few minutes..but i still have to go in..but i think im going to go in tom. with my head held a little higher than i would have before just because i wrote that letter..o0k well im gonna go get ready for tonight..bye bye.
xoxo
monica
http://x0-monica-0x.livejournal.com/8279.html

*hey
Today...Well of course no matter where you go theres going to be drama..esp. at an all girls school, since girls are the ones who start the drama most of the time. Although i've managed to stay out of it for the most part..a few of my friends were hurt today which means i was drug in it a little..but everyone is okay now..well mostly.
Then after school was bowling tryouts..and i made the team! haha i couldnt of done it without kate!
Then i came home and of course i hate being home so i was anxious to go to dance at 7. And at dance we looked at our costumes for the dance and what we picked out our teacher said she has to think about weather we can have it or not caz she said it might be to short..but it goes with the theme of our dance so i hope we can have that costume. Oo and then i had to get asked if i was doing the solo or not..i REALLY want to..but of course money is a barrier to happiness right now so i have to talk to my mom about that to see if we can get the money for it. 
And then i came home and things around the house got to me again..but on the plus side me and steph are okay again!! love ya steph!!!!!!!! haha...and steph you really have to eat ice cream and nerds.. its gooood! but you can only eat it if you are a "cheeseball"..haha..good times man.
Well im going to go.
xoxo
*monica

And lisa..thanks once again..and that one pic. haha.. loved it!!

*hey
Well today was thanksgiving..and it went great for me..and i am very thankful for that. 
I woke up around 10 to the beep of my cell phone(haha sharon) and to the smell of turkey..and my mom told me that my dad and brother werent coming till like 1:00 to pick me and her up to go to allentown(caz they invited us up there a few days ago)..so i decided i would call steph and go to the turkeybowl with judge and lincoln..haha i felt like such a trader sitting on lincolns side but its okay..okay so later on when we first got to my brothers house i felt so out of place and i thought the day was going to go horrible caz i havent seen them in such a long time..but then it started feeling more normal to me..haha my dad was slipping me a few drinks then lied to my mom that he gave me anything... but i wound up telling her anyway..o0 and it was cute caz i got to talk to my neice finally ((she was showing me her cheers.. so cute!))..and i got to see my nephew for the first time!! all in all today went especially nice because i realized i do have somewhat of a family.. and all this time thinking i had basically no one always made me feel so horrible and i really did not want the holidays to come.. but now i think we're even going up there around christmas so it should be good...o0o and polish rap has to be one of the weirdest things i have ever heard!
xoxo
*monica

*hey
I've been doing alright i guess. Last week i didnt do much at all but go out like one day. Me and Mare took a walk around..it kinda made us both feel bad though talking about old times..and even talking about the present made me feel kinda upset caz everyone is changing and moving on..
Then Friday me kim and heather were walking around with tom andrew tim zack and dave. And we seen sean who is really cute..haha kim..but then he left. And me and kim slept over heathers..we haven't done that in a while so we got to talking..And saturday morning heather had to go to the eye doctors but she let me and kim sleep..when we got up we watched grind and made mac and cheese and pizza bites haha. then heather came home and we were all extra hyper so we were dancing..HAHA KIM..heather, wasnt she too funny.
Then later on was the lock in..it started out HORRIBLE caz i was in such a bad mood..but then it got better. After our awkward talk with Marie me kelly sharon lisa jess and steph kinda got to talking..and i think we are all okay now..thats what it seemed like that night anyway..and im okay with everyone now. Then sunday i basically slept all day and talked on the phone. 
Then today i went to kims grandmoms after school till like 5.then i came home and eventually got ready for dance.
So thats basically it besides..you know the feeling where you want to hug someone special who will make it seem like everything is okay, and u just want to stay in their arms..well that feeling has been around a lot lately..but i have been doing a pretty good job ignoring it.i guess..
Well im gonna go..Bye ByeZ.
xoxo
*monica

today we got out early from school caz psat's..they were ok..it was hard though..then today was my grandmoms birthday..so we went to see her.. it was upsetting though.
then me and kim took our walk today..we're such health feens kim haha..not..o0 and then me and my mom took a ride and she got gas at the gas station near rite aid.. and she went up ditman..and i seen the guys out front of bobs and they seen me and they prob. think i was like stalkin them haha.. o0 well though..o0 haha then this kid tim bour who i went to school wit and who i havent seen since then ims me and goes we all need to hang out again.. yea, that'll happen..everyone changed to much.

right now im watchin the battle of the sexes..today was o0k..i went to school..nothin special there..lab smelled like an aquarium though caz the class who went in before ours was dissecting sharks.. eww..then i came home took my dog for a walk.. and was on the phone for a while..then later on i had to get ready for dance..last year all i had was one dance class..this year we are adult jazz now..and she wants us to not only do a jazz dance, but do a lyrical dance which is jazz and modern dance mixed.. and im still hopin to do the solo..so ne way im glad i stayed in dance this year, although i still wish i was in cheerleading..so that was my day today..we'll see wat the rest of the week brings..im gonna go bye byeZ.
